alert.note: Alert for Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 11:06AM EST until December 23 at 9:20PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Williams River At Rockingham. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 6.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 8.3 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.4 feet on 04/22/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Williams River Rockingham Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Fri 10 am: 6.8 &&
